mapper.update: update prescriptiondetailed set PrescriptionId = #{prescriptionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DrugsId = #{drugsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Useage = #{useage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Dosage = #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prescriptiondetailedcol = #{prescriptiondetailedcol,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, PrescriptionId, DrugsId, Useage, Dosage, Frequency, Price, prescriptiondetailedcol, quantity from prescriptiondetailed where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, PrescriptionId, DrugsId, Useage, Dosage, Frequency, Price, prescriptiondetailedcol, quantity from prescriptiondetailed
